scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server:start" "npm run client:start" "npm run generate:watch" --kill-others
scripts.compile: concurrently "npm run server:start" "BROWSER=none npm run client:start" "npm run generate:watch" --kill-others
scripts.db:add: cd .devops/migrator && npm i && NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --require dotenv/config" node src/index.ts add
scripts.db:clean: cd .devops/migrator && npm i && NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --require dotenv/config" node src/index.ts clean
scripts.db:update: cd .devops/migrator && npm i && NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --require dotenv/config" node src/index.ts apply
scripts.db:create: cd .devops/migrator && npm i && NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --require dotenv/config" node src/index.ts create
scripts.db:drop: cd .devops/migrator && npm i && NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --require dotenv/config" node src/index.ts drop
scripts.check:prepush: cd server && npm run check:prepush && cd ../client && npm run check:prepush
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint; cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.up: docker compose up --detach postgres clickhouse hma scylla redis otel-collector kafka && open http://localhost:16686
